file_content.text:
Posted By Ord Mantell Central Authority: A tribe of Mantellian savrips have been attacking patrols from the island near Oradam Village. Negotiations with the bestial creatures are not possible.
Ord Mantell Central Authority is offering a bounty on the leaders of savrip tribes. Return to this terminal when the task is completed. Thank you for your assistance.

Ord Mantell authorities report the death of several savrip chieftains. Your account will be credited accordingly.
Thank you for your continued service to the Republic.
Warning: Savrip attacks in the area continue to increase. Please exercise caution!
Ord Mantell authorities report that savrip attacks are on the decline, but still recommend that patrols in this vicinity exercise caution.
